name: @github/webauthn-json
description: A wrapper for the webauthn API that adapts input/output values to plain JSON with base64url.
author: GitHub, Inc. <opensource+webauthn-json@github.com>

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.copy-flow: mkdir -p dist/ && rm -f dist/index.js.flow dist/index.esm.js.flow && cp    src/index.js.flow dist/ && cp    src/index.js.flow dist/index.esm.js.flow
scripts.link-flow: mkdir -p dist/ && rm -f dist/index.js.flow dist/index.esm.js.flow && ln -s src/index.js.flow dist/ && ln -s src/index.js.flow dist/index.esm.js.flow
